title: The Midnight Library
description: Between life and death there is a library, and within that library, the shelves go on forever. Every book provides a chance to try another life you could have lived. To see how things would be if you had made other choices... Would you have done anything different, if you had the chance to undo your regrets?

title: Hearts in the Highlands
description: When city lawyer Sarah inherits her grandmother's cottage in the Scottish Highlands, she expects to sell it quickly and return to London. But the rugged landscape, quirky locals, and a certain handsome sheep farmer make her question everything she thought she wanted from life.

title: The Last Starship
description: In 2387, humanity's last hope lies aboard the starship Endeavor. Captain Maya Chen must navigate treacherous alien politics, dwindling resources, and a crew on the edge of mutiny to find a new home for the human race. But the greatest threat might come from within.

title: Shadows of Salem Academy
description: Sixteen-year-old Willow thought transferring to Salem Academy would be a fresh start. She didn't expect to discover she's a witch, that her new school sits on a supernatural battleground, or that she's the key to preventing an ancient evil from awakening.

title: The Art of Deception
description: Museum curator Emma discovers that several priceless paintings in her collection are forgeries. Her investigation leads her into the shadowy world of art theft, where nothing is as it seems and everyone has secrets. Can she uncover the truth before becoming the next victim?

title: Beyond the Veil
description: In Victorian London, medium Charlotte Ashford can speak to the dead. When a series of supernatural murders rocks the city, she must work with skeptical Detective Inspector William Hart to catch a killer who may not be entirely human.

title: Code Red
description: When a deadly virus outbreak threatens to destroy civilization, brilliant epidemiologist Dr. Rachel Hayes races against time to find a cure. But someone is sabotaging her research, and the conspiracy goes deeper than she ever imagined.

title: Second Chance Summer
description: After her divorce, teacher Lily returns to her hometown for the summer to help her sister run their family's bookstore café. She never expected to reconnect with her high school sweetheart, who's now a single dad running the local wildlife rescue center.

title: The Dragon's Heir
description: In the kingdom of Vaelthorne, dragons have been extinct for centuries. When farm girl Lyra discovers she can communicate with the last dragon egg, she becomes the target of those who would use its power for evil—and those who would see it destroyed forever.

title: Café Parisien
description: American food blogger Sophie inherits a charming café in Paris from an aunt she never knew she had. As she learns to navigate French culture, complicated family secrets, and an unexpected romance with a local chef, she discovers the true recipe for happiness.

title: The Memory Thief
description: In a world where memories can be extracted and sold, detective Nova Chen investigates a black market operation. When her own memories become the target, she must question everything she believes about her past and fight to preserve her identity.

title: Midnight at the Crossroads
description: Small-town sheriff Jake Morrison thought he'd seen everything until bodies start appearing with mysterious symbols carved into them. His investigation leads him into a world of ancient curses, family secrets, and supernatural forces that threaten everyone he loves.
